1. Pre-Processing Module¶

Library of pipeline main properties

refpy_pipe.calc_area_moment_inertia(outer_diameter, wall_thickness)¶

Calculate the area moment inertia

Parameters¶

outer_diameterfloat

Outer diameter of the pipe

wall_thicknessfloat

Wall thickness of the pipe

Returns¶

area_moment_inertiafloat

Area moment inertia

refpy_pipe.calc_axial_stiffness(outer_diameter, wall_thickness, youngs_modulus)¶

Calculate the axial stiffness

Parameters¶

outer_diameterfloat

Outer diameter of the pipe

wall_thicknessfloat

Wall thickness of the pipe

youngs_modulusfloat

Young’s modulus of the material

Returns¶

axial_stiffnessfloat

Axial stiffness of the pipe

Outer diameter of the pipe

wall_thicknessfloat

Wall thickness of the pipe

youngs_modulusfloat

Returns¶

coating_thicknessfloat

Parameters¶

wall_thicknessfloat

expansion_coefficientfloat

Thermal expansion coefficient

temperature_installationfloat

Installation temperature

pressurefloat

Returns¶

The effective axial force
